description:
This talk draws on my experience as an open source leader and community builder to provide actionable recommendations to engage with contributors in the long term. This talk will focus on the concept of inclusive leadership and how this can help us with open source sustainability.

See the full SciPy 2019 playlist at https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYx7XA2nY5GcDQblpQ_M1V3PQPoLWiDAC

title: Inclusive Leadership: Engaging Contributors in the Long Term
